Robert Gregg

Postdoctoral fellow at the University of Florida working in the Benos Lab. My current research is focused on combining causal discovery methods with multi-scale cellular models.

EDUCATION

  • 2015 – 2020

    PhD Chemical Engineering, University of Pittsburgh

  • 2011 – 2015

    BS Chemical Engineering, University of Rochester

AWARDS

  • NLM T15 Training Grant Fellowship

RESEARCH INTERESTS

  • Causal Discovery
  • Dynamic Modeling

03/2023 – Developing

CellularPotts.jl

Modeling cells in-silico.

A Julia package to simulate dynamic biological cells
1. Dynamic simulations
Provides methods for
  • - Cell movement
  • - Diffusion
  • - ODE integration
    • 2. Well documented
